sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RETRENCHMENT literally fignifies ſomething -cut off or taken from a thing ; in which fenſe it is the ſame with ſubtraction, diminution, &c.

p.hi: Retrenchment, in the art of war, any kind oſ work raiſed to cover a poll, and fortify it againſt the .enemy, ſuch as ſaſcines loaded with earth, gambions, barrels of earth, ſand-bags, and generally all things that can cover the men and ſtop the enemy. See For-tification and WAR.
